code: import{API}from'../../backend';export var getProducts=function getProducts(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/products"),{method:'GET'}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};export var getPlayers=function getPlayers(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/players"),{method:'GET'}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};export var createPlayer=function createPlayer(userId,token,player){return fetch("".concat(API,"/saqlain/").concat(userId),{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:player}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};
